description: Try our easy to follow Charred Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ vegetables,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Charred Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat chargrill over high heat. Place broccolini into a large bowl with 2 tbs oil. Toss to coat, then season.
Whisk remaining oil, zest and juice of 1 lemon and chilli in a jug.
Cook broccolini for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and tender. Transfer to a serving bowl.
Halve remaining lemon, Place, cut-side down, on grill and cook for 3 minutes or until charred. Drizzle broccolini with dressing, scatter over almonds and hemp seeds, and serve with charred lemon.
